11#include "treewriter.h"
12
13static void cost(int *const C, vp8_tree T, const vp8_prob *const P, int i,
14 int c) {
15 const vp8_prob p = P[i >> 1];
16
17 do {
18 const vp8_tree_index j = T[i];
19 const int d = c + vp8_cost_bit(p, i & 1);
20
21 if (j <= 0) {
22 C[-j] = d;
23 } else {
24 cost(C, T, P, j, d);
25 }
26 } while (++i & 1);
27}
28void vp8_cost_tokens(int *c, const vp8_prob *p, vp8_tree t) {
29 cost(c, t, p, 0, 0);
30}
31void vp8_cost_tokens2(int *c, const vp8_prob *p, vp8_tree t, int start) {
32 cost(c, t, p, start, 0);
33}
34
